name: dev.ode.la
tagline: Documentation and samples for embedding ode.la's tools on third party sites
body:
### About
[ode.la] (http://ode.la) is a community for creative writers. It also has an awesome writing app which acts as a muse and cures writers block. You can use the tool for free at ode.la. You can also embed the ode.la's creative writing tool on your site but Embedding that is a paid service. 

Here you'll find instructions, documentation and samples to embed ode.la's writing app on your site. 

### Getting an api key
Before you proceed, you'll need an api-key from ode.la. You can contact Ayush Gupta (@ayush). Send an email describing who you are and how you wise to use this

### Prerequisites
The only dependency is jquery. You must include it as below
```html
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.7.2/jquery.min.js"></script>

```

### Embedding
```html
<script>
function odelaInit() {
    odela.muse.init({apiKey:'[your-api-key]', service: serviceUrl, callback: odelaReady});
}

function odelaReady() {
    odela.muse.open({title: 'zingo bars', content: 'the snack which makes you go whack'});
}

!function(callback){var js,fjs=document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];if(!document.getElementById('odela-muse')){js=document.createElement('script');js.id='odela-muse';js.src='http://embed.ode.la/muse.min.js';js.onload=callback;js.onreadystatechange=function(){if(this.readyState=='complete'||this.readyState=='loaded'){if(callback)callback()}};fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js,fjs)}}(odelaInit);

</script>
```

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/ayush/ode-la-developer or contact Ayush (@ayush) or Sreejith (@sreejithp) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
